instanceFields.label: Collider
instanceFields.description: The collider involved in the collision.

instanceFields.label: Impulse
instanceFields.description: The impulse response of the collision.

instanceFields.label: RelativeVelocity
instanceFields.description: The relative velocity of the collision. (sum of velocities)

instanceFields.label: ContactCount
instanceFields.description: The number of contacts in the collision, iterate over this in conjunction with the GetContact Point, Norm, Impulse, and Separation.

instanceMethods.label: GetContactPoint
instanceMethods.description: The contact point of the collision.

instanceMethods.label: GetContactNorms
instanceMethods.description: The contact norm of the collision.

instanceMethods.label: GetContactImpulses
instanceMethods.description: The contact impulse of the collision.

instanceMethods.label: GetContactSeparations
instanceMethods.description: The separation between colliders at the given contact point.
